Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at  79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, 79th and Halsted, due to a police activity near 79th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, 79th and Halsted, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to a police activity near 79th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
